We have received your submission to arXiv.

Your temporary submission identifier is: [% subm.sub_id %]
You may update your submission at: [% submit_url %]

Your article is scheduled to be announced at [% subm.publish_time_string %]. The abstract will appear in the subsequent mailing as displayed below, except that the submission identifier will be replaced by the official arXiv identifier. Updates before [% subm.freeze_time_string %] will not delay announcement.

A paper password will be emailed to you when the article is announced. You should share this with co-authors to allow them to claim ownership. If you have a problem that you are not able to resolve through the web interface, contact [% www_admin %] with a description of the issue and reference the submission identifier.

- arXiv admin
arXiv, Cornell University, Ithaca NY 14853 USA
You are receiving this email because you initiated a process at arXiv.org.
If this doesn't sound right, let us know.
